1#ifndef PLATFORM_DETECT_H
2#define PLATFORM_DETECT_H
3
4// Start at 1 since undefined macros evaluate to 0.
5#define PLATFORM_LINUX 1
6#define PLATFORM_DARWIN 2
7#define PLATFORM_WINDOWS 3
8#define PLATFORM_BSD 4
9#define PLATFORM_SOLARIS 5
10#define PLATFORM_IOS 6
11#define PLATFORM_ANDROID 7
12
13#ifdef __linux__
14#define PLATFORM_DETECTED_OS PLATFORM_LINUX
15#elif defined(__APPLE__) && defined(__MACH__)
16#include <TargetConditionals.h>
17#if TARGET_OS_IPHONE == 1
18#define PLATFORM_DETECTED_OS PLATFORM_IOS
19#elif TARGET_OS_MAC == 1
20#define PLATFORM_DETECTED_OS PLATFORM_DARWIN
21#endif
22
23#elif defined(_WIN64) || defined(_WIN32)
24#define PLATFORM_DETECTED_OS PLATFORM_WINDOWS
25#elif defined(__unix__) || (defined(__APPLE__) && defined(__MACH__))
26#include <sys/param.h>
27#if defined(BSD)
28#define PLATFORM_DETECTED_OS PLATFORM_BSD
29
30#elif defined(__sun) && defined(__SVR4)
31#define PLATFORM_DETECTED_OS PLATFORM_SOLARIS
32#endif
33
34#elif defined(__ANDROID__)
35#define PLATFORM_DETECTED_OS PLATFORM_ANDROID
36#endif
37
38namespace platform {
39 enum OS { Linux, Darwin, Windows, BSD, Solaris, IOS, Android };
40
41#if PLATFORM_DETECTED_OS == PLATFORM_LINUX
42 constexpr OS os = Linux;
43 constexpr char sep = '/';
44#elif PLATFORM_DETECTED_OS == PLATFORM_DARWIN
45 constexpr OS os = Darwin;
46 constexpr char sep = '/';
47#elif PLATFORM_DETECTED_OS == PLATFORM_WINDOWS
48 constexpr OS os = Windows;
49 constexpr char sep = '\\';
50#elif PLATFORM_DETECTED_OS == PLATFORM_BSD
51 constexpr OS os = BSD;
52 constexpr char sep = '/';
53#elif PLATFORM_DETECTED_OS == PLATFORM_SOLARIS
54 constexpr OS os = Solaris;
55 constexpr char sep = '/';
56#elif PLATFORM_DETECTED_OS == PLATFORM_IOS
57 constexpr OS os = IOS;
58 constexpr char sep = '/';
59#elif PLATFORM_DETECTED_OS == PLATFORM_ANDROID
60 constexpr OS os = Android;
61 constexpr char sep = '/';
62#else
63#endif
64} // namespace platform
65
66#endif
